text.section: A majority of the full authorized voting membership of the Advisory Council is a quorum to do business.
The Advisory Council shall meet at least twice a year, at the times and places that it determines.

A member of the Advisory Council:
May not receive compensation; but
Is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
The Secretary shall designate the staff necessary to carry out this subtitle.
